languages.text: {n}Идира качает головой.{/n} "Нет, Лорд-капитан. Я, как и обещала, по пустякам дверь в варп отворять не буду. Мне и без того известно, что, чтобы нас там не ждало внизу, вы к этому готовы. Так что только вам решать, каким будет ваше будущее".

{n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door to the warp without reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира качает головой.{/n} "Нет, Лорд-капитан. Я, как и обещала, по пустякам дверь в варп отворять не буду. Мне и без того известно, что, чтобы нас там не ждало внизу, вы к этому готовы. Так что только вам решать, каким будет ваше будущее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door into the warp without a reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."

{n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door into the warp without a reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."

{n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door to the warp without reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."

{n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door to the warp without reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."

{n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door to the warp without reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉摇了摇头。{/n}“不，舰长大人。我已经答应过你，我绝不会无缘无故再次打开亚空间打大门。我知道，无论是怎样的未来等待我们，你都已经做好了准备。因此，你的未来应当由你自己决定。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door to the warp without reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉摇了摇头。{/n}“不，舰长大人。我已经答应过你，我绝不会无缘无故再次打开亚空间打大门。我知道，无论是怎样的未来等待我们，你都已经做好了准备。因此，你的未来应当由你自己决定。”

languages.text: {n}Idira niega con la cabeza.{/n} «No, Lord Capitán. Como ya he prometido, no abriré la puerta a la disformidad sin un buen motivo. Ya sé que usted está list{mf|o|a} para lo que nos esté esperando ahí abajo, de modo que su futuro depende únicamente de usted».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door to the warp without reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira niega con la cabeza.{/n} «No, Lord Capitán. Como ya he prometido, no abriré la puerta a la disformidad sin un buen motivo. Ya sé que usted está list{mf|o|a} para lo que nos esté esperando ahí abajo, de modo que su futuro depende únicamente de usted».

languages.text: {n}イディラは首を横に振る。{/n}「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン。約束したように、理由もなく歪みへの扉を開くことはしないわ。そこで何が待ちかまえていようとも、あなたの覚悟はよく分かっているつもりよ。未来をどうするかは、あなた次第」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door to the warp without reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは首を横に振る。{/n}「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン。約束したように、理由もなく歪みへの扉を開くことはしないわ。そこで何が待ちかまえていようとも、あなたの覚悟はよく分かっているつもりよ。未来をどうするかは、あなた次第」

languages.text: {n}Idira schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Nein, Lord Captain. Wie versprochen werde ich die Tür zum Warp nicht grundlos öffnen. Ich weiß bereits, dass Ihr bestens gerüstet seid, was uns dort unten auch erwartet. Es liegt also an Euch, über Eure Zukunft zu entscheiden."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door to the warp without reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Nein, Lord Captain. Wie versprochen werde ich die Tür zum Warp nicht grundlos öffnen. Ich weiß bereits, dass Ihr bestens gerüstet seid, was uns dort unten auch erwartet. Es liegt also an Euch, über Eure Zukunft zu entscheiden."

languages.text: {n}Idira secoue la tête.{/n} « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Comme promis, je n'ouvrirai pas la porte du Warp sans raison. Je sais déjà que vous êtes fin {mf|prêt|prête} à braver ce qui nous attend ; c'est à vous et à vous {mf|seul|seule} de décider de votre avenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door to the warp without reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira secoue la tête.{/n} « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Comme promis, je n'ouvrirai pas la porte du Warp sans raison. Je sais déjà que vous êtes fin {mf|prêt|prête} à braver ce qui nous attend ; c'est à vous et à vous {mf|seul|seule} de décider de votre avenir. »

languages.text: {n}İdira başını sallıyor.{/n} "Hayır Lord Kaptan. Söz verdiğim gibi öteboyutun kapısını sebepsiz yere açmayacağım. Bizi aşağıda bekleyen şeye hazır olduğunu zaten biliyorum. Nasıl bir geleceğe yelken açacağımıza karar vermek tamamen sana kalmış."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. Just like I promised, I will not open the door to the warp without reason. I already know that you are ready for whatever is waiting for us down there, so it's up to you to decide what your future will be."
